Clothing Folding Machine: A hanger that can automatically fold clothes for you, saving time and reducing wrinkles.
Multi-Functional Hanger: A hanger that can be used for hanging clothes, storing shoes, and even organizing documents or mail.
Eco-Friendly Hanger: A hanger made from recycled materials, promoting sustainability and reducing waste.
Hanger with Built-in Ironing Board: A hanger that has an ironing board built into the back, allowing for easy ironing and saving space.
Smart Hanger with UV Protection: A hanger that has a built-in UV light to kill germs and bacteria on clothes, promoting better hygiene.
